title: So Will Anything Be Done?
body:
So is anything going to be done about the high elo players deliberately taking advantage of the broken matching system in Flex queue?

Is there even any restrictions on who you can queue with? Because it's telling Challengers they can queue with people in Bronze 5.
Though to be fair I'm not seeing this happen.

No it's just the over inflated egotistical twat lords from Diamond queuing with Bronze and Silvers to face stomp Silver elo games.

replies.body:
I enjoy it when facing a higher tier opponent in lane. But not so much if my jungler is bronze and their jungler is a diamond:)

The best scenario is when both teams of bronze have one salty platinum guy trying to boost their bronze mate, and hes in my lane. I just keep them at bay while our platinum guy is destroying the opposition. Makes them so salty hahaha!
I thought it was fixed? Im in bronze 3 atm and all my games seems to be fine and bronze elo( easy asf since I'm silver 1 - gold 4 at peak)
im silver adn still get plats diamond occasionally, i meant it isnt every game, but every third or fourth.
Doesnt help my gameplay if tis bein ruined by enemies that are 15-25 divison above me
